message.content:
The required information is the line item related to cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets. In the "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" section, the line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" corresponds to cash payments to acquire such assets.

From the problem data:
| Account               | Amount      | Date      |
|-----------------------|-------------|-----------|
| Purchase of Fixed Assets | 2479994.53 | 2024-02-05 |

Therefore, the value to extract is 2479994.53.

```json
{"solution": {"value": "2479994.53"} }
```
